mobileMenu.description: Main navigation menu for the DamDoh mobile view.

logOut.title: Logged Out
logOut.description: You have been successfully logged out.
logOut.failDescription: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.

pro.unlock: Unlock advanced insights for your business.
pro.title: DamDoh Pro Coming Soon!
pro.description: Unlock deeper analytics, priority support, and more.

DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: AI-powered suggestions based on your profile and activity.
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Get real-time market data and price analytics.
DashboardRightSidebar.loadError: Could not load suggestions at this time.
DashboardRightSidebar.signInPrompt: Sign in to see personalized connection suggestions.
DashboardRightSidebar.noSuggestions: No new suggestions right now. Try expanding your profile!

toast.signInToConnect: Please sign in to connect with others.
toast.requestSentDescription: Your connection request has been sent successfully.

DashboardRightSidebar.promotionsDescription: Create and manage discounts for your products or services to attract more customers.

StartPost.placeholder: Start a post, ask a question, or share an update...

FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: Please sign in to like posts.
FeedItemCard.noComments: No comments yet. Be the first to reply!

feedError.title: Feed Error
feedError.description: Could not load the community feed at this time.

postError.auth: You must be logged in to post.
postError.fail: Failed to create post. Please try again.

postSuccess.title: Post Created
postSuccess.description: Your post has been shared successfully.

likeError.auth: You must be logged in to like posts.
likeError.fail: Failed to like post. Please try again.

commentError.auth: You must be logged in to comment.
commentError.fail: Failed to add comment. Please try again.

deleteError.auth: You must be logged in to delete posts.
deleteError.fail: Failed to delete post. Please try again.

deleteSuccess.title: Post Deleted
deleteSuccess.description: Your post has been successfully removed.

MainDashboard.noActivity: There's no activity in your feed yet. Start by connecting with others or exploring the marketplace!

profileCompletion.title: Welcome to DamDoh! Let's Complete Your Profile
profileCompletion.description: A complete profile helps others connect with you. Tell the community about yourself and what you're looking for.

CreatePostModal.title: Create a post
CreatePostModal.description: Share what's on your mind with the community.
CreatePostModal.placeholder: What do you want to talk about?
CreatePostModal.pollOptionsError: A poll must have at least two non-empty options.
CreatePostModal.emptyPostError: Your post cannot be empty. Please add some content, an image, or a poll.
CreatePostModal.pollNote: Create a poll to get opinions from your network. Max {maxOptions} options.

UniversalSearchModal.title: Universal Search
UniversalSearchModal.placeholder: Search across the entire DamDoh platform...
UniversalSearchModal.searchErrorDescription: An error occurred while performing the search. Please try again.
UniversalSearchModal.scanErrorDescription: Could not process the scanned QR code.

offline.title: You're currently offline
offline.description: Some features may be limited. Your changes will be synced when you reconnect.

syncing.title: Syncing Offline Changes
syncing.description: Uploading {count, plural, =1 {# change} other {# changes}} made while you were offline.

synced.title: Sync Complete
synced.description: All your offline changes have been saved.

syncFailed.title: Sync Failed
syncFailed.description: Could not sync all offline changes. Will try again later.

queued.title: Action Queued
queued.description: You are offline. This action will be performed when you reconnect.

tooltip.onlinePending: Online with {count} pending actions to sync.
tooltip.onlineSynced: Online and all changes are synced.
